name: Employee Work Hours
query:
SELECT 
    jctl.employee AS "Employee:Link/Employee:150",
    emp.employee_name AS "Employee Name:Data:200",
    DATE_FORMAT(jctl.creation, "%%m-%%Y") AS "Month:Data:100",
    SEC_TO_TIME(SUM(TIME_TO_SEC(TIMEDIFF(jctl.to_time, jctl.from_time)))) AS "Total Hours:Time:120"
FROM 
    `tabJob Card Time Log` jctl
JOIN 
    `tabEmployee` emp ON jctl.employee = emp.name
WHERE 
    jctl.creation BETWEEN %(from_date)s AND %(to_date)s
GROUP BY 
    jctl.employee, DATE_FORMAT(jctl.creation, "%%m-%%Y")
ORDER BY 
    jctl.employee, DATE_FORMAT(jctl.creation, "%%m-%%Y");
